translations.english_hilali_khan: Say: (O Muhammad صلى الله عليه وسلم to these Mushrikûn and Kâfirûn): "O Al-Kafirûn (disbelievers in Allâh, in His Oneness, in His Angels, in His Books, in His Messengers, in the Day of Resurrection, and in Al-Qadar)!

translations.english_saheeh: I do not worship what you worship.
translations.english_hilali_khan: "I worship not that which you worship,
translations.english_rwwad: I do not worship what you worship,

translations.english_saheeh: Nor are you worshippers of what I worship.
translations.english_hilali_khan: "Nor will you worship that which I worship.
translations.english_rwwad: nor do you worship what I worship.

translations.english_saheeh: Nor will I be a worshipper of what you worship.
translations.english_hilali_khan: "And I shall not worship that which you are worshipping.
translations.english_rwwad: Never will I worship what you worship,

translations.english_saheeh: Nor will you be worshippers of what I worship.
translations.english_hilali_khan: "Nor will you worship that which I worship.
translations.english_rwwad: nor will you ever worship what I worship.

translations.english_saheeh: For you is your religion, and for me is my religion."
translations.english_hilali_khan: "To you be your religion, and to me my religion (Islâmic Monotheism)."
translations.english_rwwad: You have your religion and I have my religion.
